column5: Looking at taking a boat in trip with Air Ivanhoe on the Ivanhoe river. I would appreciate any feedback you may have if you have gone there before. We've gone with Air Ivanhoe before to Lake Bonnar. Outfitter was great, facilities were great, but the fishing wasn't so great.

did a couple of these fly ins years ago when we flew into some lakes they no longer use.I have talked to numerous customers who while helping out at the docks one Summer said that the fishing was pretty good but that was 12 years ago and who knows how things are.I do remember a guy saying that it was a long boat ride all the way down the lake, especially when it was rough.The equipment I remember were all in first rate condition and George and his wife ran an excellent business back then and am sure they still do. Good luck.
It does sound like it will a couple hour boat ride to our cabin.
I will be on Ivanhoe Lake at the PP in July... always had decent fishing.. AC
Sorry, but what is the "PP"? We're planning on staying in the Brook cabin for a boat in trip in August. Do you ever fish the river? Thanks for your feedback.
PP= Provincial Park. Sorry about that. I mainly fish the main lake as that is where the PP is. but I have been up river before and did well. I have a Hydro map of Ivanhoe I can email if interested AC
I would greatly appreciate the map. Thank you.[email protected]
I will send it once I get home from work AC
Found it on my work PC.... you have mail. AC
